item.description:
Wacky Wednesday At The Funny Bone Comedy Club

Wednesday October 17, 2007 at 7:00 pm

At: The Funny Bone Comedy Club

Buckland Hills Mall
Manchester, CT 06040
(860)-432-8600
www.HartfordFunnyBone.com

Admission is FREE every Wednesday Nite with a Funny Bone T-Shirt (T-Shirts cost $15) Buy your shirt once, get FREE admission every Wednesday when you wear your shirt!

Look for Our CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club Table Signs, and Join Us For A Great Nite Of Comedy!


Headliner: Heath Hytche

Heath has been seen in many films and theater productions as well as on his numerous television appearances. Heath appeared in Paramount Pictures' "Odd Couple II" and most recently in Universal's "Man on the Moon." He also had many co-starring roles in movies-of-the-week for ABC television; guest starred on several shows, including ABC's "Two Guys. A Girl, and a Pizza Place," NBC's "Mad About You," NBC's "The Jeff Foxworthy Show," and appeared on "The Tonight Show" with both Johnny Carson and Jay Leno.

Click Here For Details
